BIO

Hi, I'm Dor

I'm a developer
and i like to create apps and explore new technologies

I like to work on projects that will have an effect on out lives, ultimatly making it better
I'm currently located in Tel-Aviv, Israel, and spend most of my time building and exploring technologies

Check out my resume here.

MY WORK
wikiMovie

Search for any movie, tv show, or game you want and get full details about it including ratings, actors, director, runtime and more... Project was made with vanilla JS.

iWeather

Search weather by your location and get a full forecast for the location including current weather. A special UV index styling that allows you to know if it's a good day for tanning.

COVID-19 APP

Get global and specific detailed COVID-19 information - with a nice and friendly UI you can get the number of cases and number of deaths for each place you want with detailed charts.

Budgetiy

A web app that allows you to control you incomes and expenses. It lets you know the % you have spend from your total income with a nice and friendly UI. Made with Vanilla JS.

Recipe App

A friendly recipe app that lets you search for recipes and get detailed instruction and ingredients lists. You can also like recipes and add the ingredients to your shopping lists!
